Posts.Content: Leah-2017 wrote: HELP PEOPLE PLS My mother had an MRI recently and the result showed a development of a 4 mm lesion with irregular margins within 5 months . Her Ultrasound result stated a likelihood of benign breast tumor. I don't know how to find a good reliable physician to do biopsy, and further procedures if there is any need. Please recommend me a physician. I highly appreciate your help and any further advise you can give me. I am devastated and trying to keep myself together. She is an ovarian cancer, and thyroid cancer survivor with family history of all kinds of cancer. Zipcode 90035 God bless Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Physician recommendation is needed- Los Angeles California Leah-2017 Pessa
